featured.text: Which of the following is the best title for the article? (A) Mating of Flashlight Fish and Fireflies.

definition.zh_def: 螢火蟲是一種能夠發光的小昆蟲，通常在夏季的夜晚出現。
definition.en_def: Fireflies are small insects that can produce light, commonly seen during summer nights.
definition.example: The garden was filled with fireflies, creating a magical atmosphere.
